sense.gloss: revised edition (of a book or manuscript), authoritative edition, standard edition, edition incorporating many changes and corrections
final version of a book as edited by the author, revised edition of a book as edited by the author

sdata.j: たい|てい↑本当↑↓ほん|とう↓に↑堕落↑↓だらく↓した↑感↑↓かん↓じだね。
sdata.e: Most people here have really hit the skids.
